name: arkansan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Arkansas: A fifth of Arkansans are Baptists. Carter met Clinton when the young Arkansan was running for Congress.
More examplesFewer examplesTo some Arkansans, the expensive library building resembles a mobile home.There are several things you'll never hear an Arkansan say.Currently, Arkansans can apply for a learner's permit at age 14.

belonging or relating to the US state of Arkansas or its people: The Arkansan capital city is Little Rock. His fate was left in the hands of Arkansan lawyers.
More examplesFewer examplesArkansan women were granted the right to vote in 1917.The new center offers a museum detailing black Arkansan history. He is from the Arkansan town of Springdale.
